== Getting Help ==

If you have a question about ''Ubuntu Accomplishments'', we have a few resources that you can look into.

=== Recommended ===

Our primary recommended place for support is out <nowiki>[[http://askubuntu.com/questions/tagged/accomplishments|Ask Ubuntu Support Service]]</nowiki>. Please look there to see if a question has already been asked and answered that covers your issue.

You can '''<nowiki>[[http://askubuntu.com/questions/ask?tags=accomplishments|Ask a Question Here]]</nowiki>''' - please don
t file bugs here otherwise your question will be closed. Bugs can be filed <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu-accomplishments/+filebug|here]]</nowiki>. If you do not know which project to select, use Ubuntu Accomplishments System.

=== Other Services ===

* You can also find help in `#ubuntu-accomplishments` on Freenode IRC, usually there is at least one knowledgeable person there.
